Articles.Content: Okay, I challenge everyone to build a rocket capable to entering orbit then safely returning to Kearth without jettisoning anything.
Not possible with stock parts, flat out. Dunno about Sunday Punch/Nova Silisko's. With some of the broken mod packs its trivial.

Not possible with stock parts, flat out. Dunno about Sunday Punch/Nova Silisko's. With some of the broken mod packs its trivial.

Wait, what?

What about your little 3x LFT + 2 Winglets + 1 LFE setup? Or does a powered landing not count as 'safe' in your book?

Was just about to say the same.

Building an SSTO and land it safely is rather simple, even with stock parts...

... I misread the OP. I thought it was SSTO, land, and orbit again.

SSTO and landing is of course eminently possible.

Modded parts are fine as long as they're not too cheesy...

But the more of your rocket that is stock, the better.

... I misread the OP. I thought it was SSTO, land, and orbit again.

SSTO and landing is of course eminently possible.

Well... You could probably SSTO, stage in orbit, deorbit, and SSTO again... But it'd be hard.
That might be doable; I should look into trimming the weight on one of my designs and seeing if it'll SSTO a tripletank/LFE load.
